item.title: Trent University Walkout: March 20 at Noon
item.description: The Peterborough Coalition Against Cuts to Education invites you to a cross-campus walkout in solidarity with students across Ontario to protest the cuts to post secondary education. March 20 12 pm (noon) Bata Podium Add to Calendar Peterborough Coalition Against Cuts to Education is organizing a walkout on March 20 at noon in solidarity with students across Ontario. In solidarity with students, campus unions TUFA and CUPE will be supportive of students leaving class for this event.
